meanings.definition: Of or relating to a choir.
meanings.sent1: The chorial music filled the hall with harmonious melodies.
meanings.sent2: The chorial performance at the concert was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The chorial voices blended together like a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent4: Her chorial leadership brought unity to the singing group.
meanings.sent5: The chorial harmonies resonated in the hearts of the audience.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a chorus.
meanings.sent1: The chorial singing in the play added depth to the performance.
meanings.sent2: The chorial section of the song was the most captivating.
meanings.sent3: The chorial dancers moved in perfect synchronization.
meanings.sent4: The chorial voices echoed through the theater like waves.
meanings.sent5: The chorial arrangement of voices created a powerful impact.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a group of singers.
meanings.sent1: The chorial group practiced diligently for the upcoming show.
meanings.sent2: The chorial ensemble sang with passion and precision.
meanings.sent3: The chorial choir members shared a strong bond.
meanings.sent4: The chorial performance showcased the talent of the singers.
meanings.sent5: The chorial group harmonized beautifully during the concert.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a church choir.
meanings.sent1: The chorial hymns echoed through the church walls.
meanings.sent2: The chorial singers gathered for their weekly rehearsal.
meanings.sent3: The chorial robes worn by the choir were elegant and traditional.
meanings.sent4: The chorial voices lifted the spirits of the congregation.
meanings.sent5: The chorial choir sang with reverence and devotion.
